alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 17 at 4:42PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Deschutes County through 530 PM PDT... At 441 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Deschutes River Woods, or 14 miles west of Bend, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Deschutes County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades
